answers.author: Robert Woods
answers.text:
Take a look at www.sunshinereview.org for an independent transparency checklist. This was founded by a non-governmental group and they have identified appropriate measures for state, county and city governments, along with school districts.
The City of Albany, Oregoon has been participating since we found their site in August of 2010. The information requestsed clearly falls within our state requirements for public records access, and by putting it on the web access is simple and does not require anything more than periodic updating.
